command.structurify.locate.exception.all: Can't locate any structure, all structures are disabled based on the Structurify mod config.
command.structurify.locate.structure_is_: Can't locate %s structure, structure is currently disabled based on the Structurify mod config.
gui.structurify.title: Structurify configuration
gui.structurify.structures_category.desc: Disable or enable the generation of structures within the game. Additionally, manage a blacklist of biomes where specific structures should not generate.
gui.structurify.structures.structures_gr: List of all structures for the „%s“ namespace.
gui.structurify.structures.global.title: Global settings
gui.structurify.structures.disable_all_s: All structures will be disabled regardless of the specific structure options.
gui.structurify.structures.prevent_struc: When enabled all structures will be prevented from overlapping each other.
gui.structurify.structures.min_structure: Min. distance from world center (in blocks)
All structures will only generate if they are farther than specified distance from the world center.
gui.structurify.structures.biomes_descri: Structure can be found in the following biomes:
gui.structurify.structures.warning: Bear in mind that each structure may still be enabled or disabled by individual mods and datapacks.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.ove: Whenever to override flatness check from global or „%s“ namespace settings with specific settings of the „%s“ structure.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.ena: The structure will only generate if the terrain under the structure is flat enough based on the specified threshold.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.fla: The maximum height difference (in blocks) allowed for the terrain to be considered flat.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.all: Liquid, air and other "special" blocks will count as solid blocks and will not fail the check.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.ove: Whenever to override biome check from global or „%s“ namespace settings with specific settings of the „%s“ structure.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.ena: The structure will only generate if all biomes within the specified distance are present in the list below.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.bio:
The mode based on what biome check checks the biomes.

Strict: structure will generate only in biomes specified in the list up

Blacklist: if any part of structure is generated in biomes specified in the list below, structure will not generate
List of current blacklisted biomes/biome tags in which the „%s“ structure can not be generated when the biome check is enabled.
List of current biomes in which the „%s“ structure will be generated.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.ste: The step where the structure generates.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.jig:
The size (depth) of jigsaw structures to generate.

 - 20: Biggest structure
 - 1: Smallest structure
Max. distance from structure center (in blocks)
The maximum distance from the structure center (in blocks), where can part of the structure (jigsaw piece) be generated.
Max. horizontal distance from structure center (in blocks)
The maximum horizontal distance from the structure center (in blocks), where can part of the structure (jigsaw piece) be generated.
Max. vertical distance from structure center (in blocks)
The maximum vertical distance from the structure center (in blocks), where can part of the structure (jigsaw piece) be generated.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.is_: When disabled, the structure will not generate.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.ter: The type of terrain adaptation used for the structure.
gui.structurify.structure_sets.warning: Bear in mind that each structure set may have unique placement rules and overrides defined by individual mods and datapacks, which means that changing this value might not always produce the intended structure spread.
Configure custom structure spread either via global spacing and separation modifier or per structure specific spacing and separation values.
gui.structurify.structure_sets.enable_gl: Enable global spacing and separation modifier
Spacing and separation of each structure set will be multiplied by this value.
gui.structurify.structure_sets.global_sp:
When different from default value of 1.0, each structure set will be either more concentrated or more spread out.

 < 1.0 - more concentrated 
 = 1.0 - unaffected 
 > 1.0 - more spread out
gui.structurify.structure_sets.override_: Whenever to override global spacing and separation modifier from global settings with specific settings of the „%s“ structure set.
gui.structurify.structure_sets.salt.desc: Salt is a number that assists in randomization, each structure set should have an unique salt.
gui.structurify.structure_sets.frequency: Frequency represents the probability to try to generate if other conditions are met.
gui.structurify.structure_sets.spacing.d: Spacing is the average distance in chunks between structures within the same structure set (group of structures).
gui.structurify.structure_sets.separatio: Separation is the minimum distance in chunks between structures within the same structure set (group of structures). The separation value cannot be greater than the spacing value.
